keyMoments.title: Crew Works Together to Save Ryu
keyMoments.description: The crew demonstrates teamwork during the storm when Zoro catches the broken ropes and Luffy uses his new lasso technique to pull Ryu to safety.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's coordination and commitment to protecting those under their care.

keyMoments.title: Navigating to the Hidden Island
keyMoments.description: Under Nami's navigation, the crew successfully guides the Going Merry through mirages and storms to reach the mysterious island.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's seamanship and Nami's value as navigator in dangerous conditions.

keyMoments.title: Discovery of Ancient Knowledge
keyMoments.description: The crew discovers the ancient temple murals that reveal the true location of the Lost Island.
keyMoments.significance: The crew's exploration leads to the crucial information needed to complete their mission.
